titleStmt.title: R. E. Collins et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG4529

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: We the undesigned Citizens of Frankfort & Franklin County would respectfully represent to His Excellency the Governor of Kentucky that there is now in the hands of the sheriff of said County a Fifa in the name of the Comlth against Jno Brewer & Geo D Rucker on Replevin Bond ^for $2000/100 The facts are these Judgment was obtained in Franklin Circuit Court against said Brewer for Selling Whisky. said Brewer is exceedingly Poor & ignorant and the collection of said Fifa would leave the family of said Brewer in a very destitute and dependent condition. We therefore ask Yr. Excellency to remit the same.
All the Officers of the Court (except P U Major then Comlths Attorney) have released all fees against him.

R E Collins S F C
J A Crittenden
H. B. James d.s.
H I Todd
W. H. Sneed
R P Pepper
E H Watson
E H Taylor Jr
John M. Harlan

Franklin Cir Ct
vs
Rucker & Brewer
$20
Tipling
12th Jany/ 64
